answers.answer: Hello,There can be many causes of your symptoms. Thyroid disorders, diabetes mellitus, depression, blood pressure fluctuations, hormonal disturbances and anxiety all can cause such symptoms. Losing weight can be due to several reasons. Worm infestation, diabetes mellitus, thyroid disorders, malabsorption syndromes all can cause weight loss. You should consult a physician and get evaluated. Treatment will depend on the underlying cause. Hope it helps.Take care and regards!

question: I had Tsh level of 6.8 before....I took 25mcg levothyroxine for 3 months and then it was 2.6..and doctor said continue the same medicine for another 3 months...but I am feeling tired,fatigu and muscle aches,back pain,body pain and dizziness all the time....what it shoul be???I am really very irritated now....I dont like to live like this anymore...these problems destroying my life....please help me. and forgot to say i lost 3 kg weight even i have on a heavy diet..and looking like a skeleton....please help me...
title: anxiety,body aches,backpain,muscle aches
